summary: This is an email from Allison Stoddart forwarding a calendar appointment for a Zoom meeting related to the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell. The meeting is scheduled for November 22, 2021, and involves several individuals, including legal personnel from the U.S. Attorney's Office.

persons.name: Allison Stoddart
persons.context: Appears as the sender of the email forwarding a calendar appointment for a Zoom meeting regarding the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

persons.name: Anjan Sahni

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, which is the topic of the scheduled meeting.

connections.description: Both are involved in coordinating or attending a legal meeting regarding the Ghislaine Maxwell case, suggesting a professional working relationship.
Stoddart is organizing a meeting related to the legal case against Maxwell, indicating a professional connection through the legal proceedings.
Sahni is a recipient of a meeting invitation regarding the legal case against Maxwell, suggesting involvement in the legal proceedings.

events.title: Zoom Meeting on United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: A scheduled Zoom meeting to discuss the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, involving legal personnel.

keyFacts: A Zoom meeting was scheduled for November 22, 2021, to discuss the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.
The meeting was coordinated by Allison Stoddart and included Anjan Sahni as a recipient.
The document indicates the use of virtual meeting platforms (Zoom) for legal proceedings related to the Epstein/Maxwell case during 2021.
